main: ^We rarely get new visitors on the island nowadays.
^I usually only see the same few faces every day.
section1: ^Is it different from the store on the other side of the island?
^Oooh... Do you mean that young Sugu's store?
^That is the general store, here I sell fresh fruits and vegetables that people use for cooking...
^Say, do you like to cook dear?
section2: ^Most young people nowadays just buy food from the restaurant back there...
section3: ^Anyways, if you do plan on doing some cooking feel free to look through what I have for sale...
^After all, you can only get so far with fish and salt...
^I'll be sure to check it out!
section4: ^I'm open from 8am to 5pm, so feel free to stop by at any time!
